roleset.name: associated with questionable/criminal actions

role.descr: complicit with what/whom? in what actions?

example.name: complicit-j
example.text: You have been complicit in any fraudulent application by allowing it to happen with full knowledge .

propbank.arg: by allowing it to happen with full knowledge

example.name: complicit-j: All args, different realization
example.text: He is complicit with the Globalist / Saudi - run world government crowd .

propbank.arg: with the Globalist / Saudi - run world government crowd

roleset.note: COMPLICIT-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from complicit.01-j)
